description.value: You regularly face off against undead and can identify many with a glance. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on skill checks to Recall Knowledge about undead. Whenever you roll a critical failure on a check to Recall Knowledge about undead, you get a failure instead.

value.value: expert in Religion or Undead Lore

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
